q2 = titanic_df['fare'].quantile(0.75)
iqr = q2 - q1                           #iqr stands with Inter Quarter Range
print(q1,q2,iqr)
source.33e372e1:

upper_outlier = titanic_df.fare > (q1 + 1.5 * iqr)
